articles.author: Jennifer Agiesta, Ariel Edwards-Levy
articles.title: CNN Poll: More than 6 in 10 SOTU viewers had a positive reaction to Biden’s speech - CNN
articles.description: More than 6 in 10 Americans who watched President Joe Biden’s State of the Union address had a positive reaction to the speech, according to a CNN Poll conducted by SSRS, with a smaller 35% reacting very positively.
articles.content: More than 6 in 10 Americans who watched President Joe Bidens State of the Union address had a positive reaction to the speech, according to a CNN Poll conducted by SSRS, with a smaller 35% reacting v… [+5280 chars]
